message: Let's start fair, I'll take the bigger share this time, but I'm sure you'll get a better deal in the next round.
Let's be fair this time. You got a big share last round, now it's my turn.  We can keep splitting the money fairly if you accept.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make up for the previous round. Let's aim for a more even split in the future.
